263a5: yang ku dang / na ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar byas te kham por kha sbyar du byas nas stong phrag brgya du mngon par bsngags pas lus la byugs te g.yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs/
263a6: dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu gcig zlos shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong ngo // ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun zlos shig/ mi
263a7: snang bar 'gyur ro/ / nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bco lnga zlos shig/ nad 'joms par byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis zlos shig/ bcud dam bcud kyis len so sor rnyed
263a8: do/ / da zos pas gnyer ma dang skra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro// lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal po'i
263b1: btsun mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sprin te 'dod pa nye bar bzhag pa ni ma gtogs so// ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yam shing 'bum sprin sreg gyis shig/ gser srang brgya so sor rnyed do//
263b2: 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bgegs med par 'gyur ro// bi n+yA ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum zlos shig/ rked pa'i nad med par 'gyur ro//
263b3: rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya'o// bskal pa bzang por 'gyur ro// dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg
263b4: gyis shig/ gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyed do// rgyal gyi lugs las byung ba'i srang shi na tu mdzes pa la 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu pa byaHsa nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas nyin mtshan
263b5: du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du 'azlas par bya'o/ / gang gi tshe me stag 'phro bar byed pa dang / ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas
263b6: grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'du bar byed cing 'khor dang bcas pa 'a phur bar byed do/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang / thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do// snga bar langs nas
263b7: lor bzlas par byed do/ / mchog sbyin par byed do// zla ba drug tu lan cig brjod pas nad chen po grol lo// zla ba cig tu zlos shig dus ma yin par gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed do// nyin gcig pa dang /
263b8: nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams su'o// bud med dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar/ lnga pan la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa cig gyis
264a1: shig dbang du 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni yugs sa mos skyes bu yi'o// rgyal po ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i ye shing la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin
264a2: sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la mtshan mo thun gsum du lan tshwa nyi shu rtsa cig sbyin sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro// mgo bo la lan gsum mam bdun du mngon par bsdigs
264a3: nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par byed na rgyal po'i gnang chen por 'gyur ro/ / brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i rma bya'i mdongs kyis phyag par byas nas dug 'joms so// ldong ros a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par
264a4: byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas yang dag par brtsams par bya ste skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes cig nas brtsams te/ 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas
264a5: nas gos lan gsum brjes te/ a ka ru dang du ru ka dang / tsan dan rnams bsregs shing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa 'am/ thang las skyes pa'i dri zhim po'i me
264a6: tog dang / ba'i mar gyi mar me gsum mo/ mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do// thun mtshams su bza' ba yang ji ltar nus pa sbyin no// ring bsrel dang /
264a7: bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i ye shing la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas ras ris las 'od
264a8: gzer 'byung ba dang / sa 'gul ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / 'phreng ba g.yo bar byed pa ste/ mtshan ma 'di rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i mig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te stong phrag rdzogs
264b1: pa'i bsregs blugs byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid grub pa rnams pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / 'bras bu can la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par
264b2: bsngags pa byas nas gang du klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o/ / de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byed do// nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin par byed do// 'bras bu can la mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas
264b3: mngon par bris nas/ de bzhin du khron pa 'am/ mtsho phran du bzhugs par bya'o// de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du gzhug go/ der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gnas so// de nas
264b4: blangs par bya ste chu klung gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa bgrod dka' ba can gyi 'dun pa 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste lha rnams dran pa byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o// de 'phags pa'i
264b5: zhal du yang bcug nas cung zad yang dag par gsungs par mdzod cig ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro/ / chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsams te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par
264b6: bsngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la gtor bar bya'o/ / dug med par 'gyur ro// de la brjod pa'i tsho gas dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par mi 'gyur ro// sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blangs nas tsu ru bza' zhing mi smra
264b7: bar dkrol 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te ji srid gsum pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum bzlas so/ / thab drug/ tu tshangs par spyod pa dang brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing zlabs dngas grub dang / zla ba drug gis
264b8: 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / lus kyis kyang mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do// zla bas sngags thams cad grub par byed do// gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris nas de'i stong
265a1: du rkang pa g.yon pa bzhag ste g.yogs pa'i phyogs su 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do// klu thams cad kyi gnas su rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces
265a2: brjod par bya'o/ / der rab tu 'jug par byed do// de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed do// thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung ngu blangs te sbrul gyi steng du yongs su thor cig/
265a3: sbrul bzlog pa byas par 'gyur ro// slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste gos dkar po'i kha dog can la sa las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug na/
265a4: khug shig shi yang slong bar byed do// ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang ral gri dang / sti gri dang / 'khor lo dang / b+hu ShuN+Da la sogs pa rnams pa byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i bsregs blugs bya ste/ rdzas gang
265a5: y ang ru ba blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos shig phyi nas ji ltar byas pa'i rim gyis ldong ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar te ji srid me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg
265a6: par bya'o/ / de nas rgud mtshungs pa'i baM las byung ba'i 'o ma bu mos bsrubs pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o// de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod sbrang rtsis bkang ba la yang ngo // de nas blangs te gur kum gyi zam
265a7: t og tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba byas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du spyad par gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris
265a8: nas bzhis dgab par bya'o/ / ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad
265b1: dbang du byed do/ / du bas mi snang ba'o// 'bar bas nam mkha' la 'gro'o// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// de bzhin du mig sman pa bla sgrub par byed pa dang / gi baM la cho ga
265b2: 'di'o/ / dkar po'i bco lnga la pad+ma'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te/ ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'di nyid la
265b3: dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo/ / ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig/ de nas bzo bo dbang po ma tshang ba min pa gso sbyong can gyi lcags gsum gyis pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa'am/ brgyad pa gdan dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa
265b4: byas nas gur kum dang / gi baM dang / ga bur rnams nam mkha'i chus btags pa pad+mar bcug cing / dkar po'i brgyad pa las ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan mo gsum du spyang bar gnas pas skyil mo krung
265b5: gis 'dug ste sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas pad+ma des 'khor dang bcas pa rig par 'gyur ro//
265b6: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do// de bzhin du gdu bu dang / cod pan dang / lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dang dgra sta dang / 'khor lo yang zhes
265b7: pa'o/ / 'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga pa'i 'khor lo byas nas so rnon po 'khoro mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mtho gang gi tshad do// gang+gA'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong
265b8: bur bya'o/ / de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsan dan dmar pos mchod de ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar po dang phreng ba phul nas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyi smyung bar gnas pas slongs mos dge 'dun la ston mo
266a1: byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o/ / gtsang ma gos btsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug
266a2: pa la sogs pa rnams phul nas ji ltar nye bar 'byor pa'i mar me phul nas 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhir yang mar me bzhi dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ tsan dan
266a3: dmar pos btags pa rnams la lan re bzlas te ri res bsnun par bya'o/ / ji srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o// de nas 'khor lo sgra dang / 'od gzer 'phro ba dang / de nas 'bar ro// gnyis pa
266a4: 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig/ de blangs par bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin
266a5: par 'gyur te dpag tshad stong phrag bcur rig pa 'dzin pa chen po klu dang gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyur ro/ / lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// shi na yang bde ba can du skye bar
266a6: 'gyur ro/ / de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na/ sai le ta ka dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / rgya skyegs dang / gu gul dang / tA ra ba ra ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / gi ri kaR+Shi dang / 'bru'i phub ma dang /
266a7: ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling dang / du ru ka rnams/ cig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byed du gzhug go/ de nas ser skya rgud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar
266a8: gyis cig tu byas nas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go/ de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du spyang bar gnas pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu la ci
266b1: blangs te a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums pa byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bgrang phreng dang til mar dang / phye ma la sogs pa gzhan la sbyin par bya'o// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste mchod pa'i cho ga byas pas lag
266b2: pa g.yas pas mnan te ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / yang dag par bgos te/ bar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lha gzugs can rnams 'ong ngo // grub pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo // lo brgya phrag
266b3: lngar 'tshe bar byed do/ / de nas 'bar byed nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so// 'di yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs su 'gyur ro// gsum pa 'am bdun pa'i sgrub pa la
266b4: mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed do// bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par sgrub thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzogs so// /
266b5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag par gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
266b6: sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ mi dang 'byung po'i dbus gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas// dkyil 'khor las can thams cad ni// sems dpa' chen po smros shig
266b7: spros/ / sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang // phun tshogs thams cad mngon par 'phel// sgrub po rnams la phan pa yi// don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par spros// ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi// lus can bar mar gyur
266b8: pa rnams/ / khyod kyi tshig gi mchog gyur pa// 'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni// myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la// sems can gang du rab zhugs pa// de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang // sangs rgyas bye ba stong
267a1: rnams kyis/ / thams cad de la rjes yi rang // dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa// dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni// sems can rnams kyi mgon pos spros// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi
267a2: tshig/ sems can cho ga yang dag 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gang 'di thos nas ni// rab tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur// dpal min 'joms shing zhi ba dang // de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing // dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi// gzi
267a3: brjid stobs ni rnam par 'phel/ / mthong ngam mthos nas de nas ni// rab tu dad pa skyed par byed// gang yin de rnams bdag gis ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni// thob pa'i ched du'ang lung bstan to// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas
267a4: 'byung 'gyur ba/ / 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ni// rjes su yi rang 'gyur ba yin// dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel byed pa// de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa// sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten
267a5: mgon/ / yang dag bka' yis smros shig smos// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa cig tu byas nas pus mo
267a6: g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la tha mi dad pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bstod do// shAkya'i rgyal po lha yi
267a7: rgyal/ / phun tshegs yon tan du ma can// rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul rab ma nyams// rgyun tu dkar ba'i gos dad ldan// mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri// blo bzang snying po brtan pa 'dzin// gang phyir khyod ni phun tshegs nyid// 'di ni
267a8: 'gro ba de dag gi/ / dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni// mgon po lha rnams kyi ni ste// rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang // de yi tshig ni rab rig pa// dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid// 'bras bu gsum nyid 'dzin par byed// de de gzhan du de yis ni// lha yi
267b1: mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa/ / brgyad kyis 'dir ni dbang zhal las// skyes pa'i dpa' bo rab stobs dang // g.yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang // kun nas gser gyi ri dang ldan// cod pan yang ni lhan cig gdan// lha dang
267b2: lha min lhar bcas pa'i/ / lhag pa'i theg pa thams cad kyi// 'jig rten par do'i srid pa dang // skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs// byung ba mdzes ldan rang nyid kyi// 'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste// gang rnams zla ba lta bur dkar// lha rnams
267b3: kyis bzung ri bong can/ / kun da du ku dkar po yi// gos ni banabs nyid tsa kor// brgya byin 'dab brgya pa yi mig/ sa bsrungs phrag par phyogs gcig 'gro/ bla ma'i ril ri bong can// rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni// mig brgya
267b4: brtson 'grus ma nyams pas/ / grangs dang chu gter chu 'byin pa// tshegs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang // dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang // nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni// rnam par zas dang dri 'khor ba// bum dkar gang ba so so yi// bum pa de
267b5: rnams dbang bskur zhing / / tsan dan sa mchog yan lag bshad// gi ba ma thig le rnam par bkra// yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i// dga' ba mchog gi yan lag dang // lus med gzhom pa'i ched du byas// yan lag chags
267b6: pa byas mtha' las/ / khrus ni stug pos mi 'pho bas// gzhan du 'chi med legs pa ni// de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi// dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i// char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni// sngon
267b7: las khyod ni lam gyi mgo/ dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang // me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la// rnam par tshar phyin longs spyod ldan// bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid// bcos nas sngar med cho ga yis// bcu par khyod ni zhi ba ste// mgo med 'gra
267b8: ba mtha' yas las/ / gang phyir srid pa mtha' med cing // dri mas lha dang lha min yang // de yi brtul zhugs phan tshun du// dam pa'i spyan gyi 'od kyi snang // 'khyil pa can yangs yan lags mchog/ phyogs su lha rnams gnas pa dang //
268a1: mi rnams byang chub rnam sangs rgyas// rab tu byed 'gyur zhes pa ni// me rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las// de phyir rnam pad chu skyes na// lA ya yan lag dam par son// dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags
268a2: bral/ / 'chi bzhin sa yi lus kyang 'khod// kun nas gtod dang kun nas sdung // yang dgas dang phyogs dang ldan// rnam pa ni mnyam par byang chub ldan// byang chub shing drung bdud dpung las// rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang // sangs rgyas /
268a3: 'phang 'pho med dang // glu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru// zhe sdang rtsub po'i nags rnams kyis// rkang pa sdong bu mi yi med// rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa// zla bo'i mni 'bar ba la// mi g.yo rab tu sbyin par byed// phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu sgom// gzhal pa'i
268a4: 'khri shing gzugs brnyan brtan/ / dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni// 'jigs pa'i nyi ltar rnam mdzes pa// yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
268a5: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
268a6: sems dpa' chen po'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer phye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste 'od zer de rnams kyis gad+hA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to/ / dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad
268a7: kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ / gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
268a8: legs so lags so// sems dpa' chen po spros shig/ mthu chen po sems can sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smos shig/ gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
268b1: byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba dang / sa chen po ri dang / nags dang / phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g.yes
268b2: so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags bshad par brtsams so// dang por re shig
268b3: bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig mthong ba'i slob dpon dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob cing dad pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ sems can rnams kyi stobs dang / spobs ma yin pa shes pa/ ser shA med cing
268b4: g.yo sgyu med pas nag po med cing ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba dri ngan pa med pas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa/ mdzes pa/ snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes pa
268b5: dang / snying rje dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/ sems can gyi dgongs pa dang / bsam pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/ cha mang po mngon par shes pa/ gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba/ dkyil
268b6: 'khor bri ba'i las la byang ba/ rig gsum gang yang rung ba'i rig pa la sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ phyag dang dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa/ mchod rten gyi las byas pa/ ha cang mirgan byis pa dang / rigs dma' bar skyes pa
268b7: ma yin pa/ gzhon zhing lang tshe dang ldan pa dang / tshul bzang po'i sgrub pa pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes so// de nas 'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya ste/ rus med
268b8: 'dul nyes ma yin pa/ / dkyil 'khor yang dgar bsgyur bya// rmongs pa'i sems dang chags can la// dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya// gang zhig bslab la yud tsam yang // lhag par 'gro ba'i lus can des// mtho ris thar pa yang dag
269a1: 'grub/ / yid kyi dbang phrag thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni rjes zhag pa'o// dngas thub dmags pa nyid mi 'gyur// byang chub bar rigazun pa'i// sems delas ni yang da / brtsam/
269a2: denas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rab tu dad pa'i sems can rnams// bdag nyid kho nar rab rtogs bya// de la bstan bya'i dkyil 'khor bri// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis//
269a3: stobs kyis sngon 'dul si tha'i lus// cho 'phrul gyi ni bla phyed la// grong dang grong khyer grob rdal dang // ljongs rnams su ni byang shar gyi// phyogs kyi cha ru mchod yon byin// sa yi mthil du de ji ltar/
269a4: sa phyogs sngags la sngags 'gyur ba// sdum zhing ljon shing me tog bzang // 'bras bus yang dag mang po can// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i phyogs// dkar dang ser ba'i sa gzhi la// gyo mo bong ba
269a5: gseg ma bral/ / rnga bo che yi sna dbyangs dang // lam gyi bzhi mdo dur khrod dang // lha gzhan yongs su bzung ba dang / shis cing sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la// gang du kun nas rgyang grags lnga'i//
269a6: tshad du chu klung lteng ka dang // mtshe phran chu bo rab 'bab pa// ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang // me tog nyid ni dus rgyun tu// shin tu rgya chen yang dag ldan// cho 'phrul phyogs ni gang rung la// de nas bcom ldan
269a7: 'das ma yi/ / dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der// nyi ma gung la song nas ni// ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yi// mngon par mdzes pa'i las bya'o// thog mar rab dag sems can kun// byams dang snying rje dang ldan/
269a8: pas// dkyil 'khor gnas der yid kyis dmigs// dge ba'i rig pa gdon par bya// sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang // de bzhin dbyangs ni rjes su gdon// 'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du// dkyil 'khor lus can kun gyis
269b1: bri/ / phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i gnas su gnas// thog mar gtor ma byin byas nas// dri yi yam shing yang dag ldan// gnas su gnas pas kun zos nas// go rims bzhin du spyan drang ba'i// dbyangs kyi tshig 'di
269b2: brjod par bya/ / slob dpon ming ni che ge bdag/ bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi// dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar 'tshal// bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang // bdag mthar ba drug
269b3: pa'i sems med pa/ / bskyed cing bkur stir byed pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang ba'i// sems can rnams la phyir zhing ni// mang du rab tu dad pa'i ched// dkyil 'khor
269b4: bri bar bdag 'tshal lo/ / de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod// de nas sems can de rnams ni// dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon gyi// mtshan mo mthong ba sbyin par
269b5: byed/ / de nas bris pa'am gzhan du song // tho rangs rmi lam rnam par spyad// sa yi phyogs der song nas ni// khru brgya yi ni tshad du yang // kun nas gru bzhi pa ru bya//
269b6: phyi rol dpag tu med pa yi// dkon mchog gsum gyi tshad song nas// sa la shing dang phub ma dang // thal ba sol ba so phag dang // sgra dang sen mo mchod sbyin gyi// so phag nag po la sogs
269b7: gang / / gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dge ba yi// mi dge'i bug rngu thams cad kun// lhag ma med par bsal nas ni// sa yi gong bu de nyid du// gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi// 'grab
269b8: gnyis sa ni sbyang byas nas/ / rab tu bcug ste tho bas brdung // tsan dan chu yis yang dag gtor// de ltar byas nas ma ltung ba'i// ba byung tsan dan chubasres nas// / khru brgyad pa yi phyogs/
270a1: spyan// snre la gyis kyang 'ab cu sa// cad du yongs su spangs pa la// gas stong byen nas rgyug drugs// dasrungs mi phyogs de ni// shin 'dam zhing shin
270a2: ni/ / legs par rdzogs par skyes kyi bar// de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni// de nas khru bzhi'i tshad du ni// grwa bzhi seng ldeng pur bu brgyad// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du bya// gzhon nu mas bkal
270a3: srad bu ni/ / tshon sna lnga pa legs 'jam pa// shan tu sra ba bcom ldan ma'i// rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun gyis// bsngags pas pur bu la dkris nas// bdun byas srod la gdab par bya// de nas dkyil
270a4: 'khor slob dpon gyis/ / gtsang ma'i gos ni bgos pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus de ru// rtsa ba nag po med pa yi// bum blung dri yi chu dang ni// me tog sgron mas bka pal// mgrin par
270a5: me tog phreng bar dkris/ / a mra'i yal mdapa kha dgab bya// pus mo dag ni nges btsugs nas// rtsa ba'i rig pa bdun byas te// yang na nyi shu rtsa cig brjod// de nas phyogs bcur kun
270a6: bltas nas/ / 'di ni bsgrags bya che ge dag/ gnas 'dir sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir// sems can kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// bsam byas dkyil 'khor bris pa 'dir // sangs rgyas
270a7: phan par mdzad pa kun/ / dkyil 'khor du ni byon par mchod// da lta 'dir ni byon nas kyang // bdag gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol// de dbus nyid du brtag bya ba// gnas su
270a8: bris pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ / spyan drang bya zhing lha rnams kyi// gnas mdor bstan nas brjod par bya// dga' ldan du ni byang chub sems// 'jig rten gzhan du gang gnas pa//
270b1: de bzhin kha ba'i gnas su dang // gang ldan pad+ma'i dbang phyug 'byung // lung lo can du nor dbang phyug/ te se ru ni bde byed bshad// mchod yon snod ni bkang ba yis// de rnams gnas ni rnam
270b2: bsams bya/ / de nas zhal ni srab bsnyen bkur// dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la// ming dang gnas ni yongs nyams ni// phyin ci log tu ldog par 'gyur// de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni//
270b3: nyin po nyin re tsan dan gyi// mu yis zug tu gzhug par bya// mtshan pa'i thun la'ang de bzhin bya// bar 'dir yo byad thams cad ni// rnam par 'byor par 'gyur ba yin// de la 'don
270b4: brjod bya ste/ / dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa yi// bye ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin skyes// jo ba'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'i// phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// pad+ma rA ga ut+pal// phye ma
270b5: mtha' dag gis gdab bya/ / kur gum chu dang mtshungs pa dang // puSh+pa rA ga yi dkyil 'khor// zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs shing // de bzhin ma ra ka tas kyang // de tsam
270b6: kha dog rin chen ma/ / lcags kyang rung ste ming can lnga// yang na dris brtags phye mas sam/ ji ltar rnyed pa rnam sprul pas/ rab bkug rin chen bye ma yis//
270b7: yang dag pa yi dngos grub 'dod// nor bu ching bu ma tshungs min gang // pad+ma rAgs rnam pa kun// dkyil 'khor lo brad thams cad kyang // slob dpon gyis ni gnon nu pa'i// lag pas
270b8: byed du gzhug par bya/ / bram ze rgyal rigs rigs skyes pa// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / ma nor skyes pa rab mdzes pa// dbang po ma tshad ma yin pa/
271a1: mdor na bud med mtshan nyid dang // yang dag ldan par skyes pa yis// 'di 'dra'i gzhon nu ma cig gnyis// gsum la gso sbyong sbyin nas ni// 'o ma'i zas kyis mngon
271a2: dga' bar/ / byas nas dkar po'i gos bgos te// dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad ni// byed gzhug dkyil 'khor yo byad kun// legs bsags so sor brtags pa yis// chu dang rnam par dbyen pa
271a3: dang / / dge slong 'dul ba byas pa dang // yongs su snang ba byas pa dang // gtsang sbra'i spyod pa sngon 'gro bas// slob dpon rang gi lhag gnas ched// phye ma thams cad bdug pa dri// gtor ma
271a4: dang ni mar rnams ni/ / cho ga can gyis byed du gzhug/ de nas slob dpon yo byad kun// tshogs nas dkyil 'khor rang nyid bri// slob ma yongs su bzung bar gyis// de rnams sangs rgyas chos dang ni//
271a5: dge slong dge 'dun la rab dang // yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa// bden par smra dang sbom pa min// mdzes pa mthong dang kha dog gtsigs// gzung bar mi bya gcig gnyis gsum// bco brgyad dang
271a6: ni gzhan bcu drug/ de rnams skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // 'o ma'i ston mo bza' ba dang // 'o ma'i shing las byung ba yi// so shing sor mo brgyad kyi tshad// bcom
271a7: ldan rtsa ba'i snying po yis/ / lon ni nyi shu rtsa bdun du// mngon par bsngags nas pa yi gcin// rab sbyar mtshan mo'i thun mtshams su// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi phyi rol du// shar du mngon phyogs su
271a8: sha yis/ / khres la rim pas nyer 'dug nas// snying po re re lag par byin// rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas// gtsug tor bcing la'ang bdun bzlas bya// de nas so shing de rnams la// byin nas rang rang
271b1: so shing bza'/ / ral gcig ma yi snying po yis// lan bdun bsngags pa'i dri yi chus// spyi bor mngon par gtong bar bya// de nas de rnams la brjod bya// bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
271b2: dbang phyug mchog gi thugs rje can// chen po'i mchog ni sbyin pa po// bsgral dka' sgrol ba dran par gyis// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yang // reg pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub
271b3: sems dpa' kun/ / bskyed par byed ma dran par gyis// de yi 'og tu slob dpon gyis// slob ma de rnams kun la ni// 'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos// brtan par byas nas de rnams mdun// /
271b4: shes rab pha rol phyin bklag bya// de lta bu yi cho ga yis// bud med rnams kyang yongs bzung bya// langs nas bu mos bkal ba yi// srang bu tshon snga lnga pa ni// mi mnyam rgyud du bsgrim pa
271b5: la/ / dri yi chu yis mngon bkrus nas// re rer pad+ma'i bgrang phreng gis// gsang gtor byas nas rtsa ba yi// snying po lan grangs nyid cig tu// mngon bsngags de la 'dir brjod bya// dpal gyi
271b6: gzhi ni yod pa'i phyir/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs mtshan ma// byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba ste// pad+ma'i bgrang phreng de phyir bsngags// de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis// slob ma rnams
271b7: lar phra mos/ / lag pa la ni bcing bar bya// slob ma rnams la gang kho na// de nyid slob ma bdag nyid bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas pa// shar du mngon phyogs bla gos ni// phrag
271b8: pa gcig tu byas nas ni/ / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni// sa la rab tu btsugs byas te// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba dang // rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub thams cad dang /
272a1: rang rgyal 'phags pa nyan pas dang // lhagag no // nadra pa dang // l+h+wam 'dra dngas rtag/ zeng ba yongs la nas gyu// kun lagasol ba gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor byan thob dang/
272a2: bdag/ che ge mo zhes bya ba yis// bcom ldan 'phags ma stel ma yi// dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal lags na// de dag rang nyid byon par mdzod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun dang // byang
272a3: chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas/ / nyan thos lha klu gnod sbyin dang // dri za lta min nam mkha' lding // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang gi rig pa sngags tshogs kyis// yongs bskor sems
272a4: can thams cad la/ / rjes su brtse bas byon nas kyang // bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzod// de ltar yang gnyi ya gsum du// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// rtsa ba'i rig
272a5: pa bzlas pa dang / / dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la bltas nas// dbus su me tog phreng ba der// gal te me tog phreng g.yo byed// de nas byon par shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas byang
272a6: sems la/ / dri yi chu yis mchod yon dang // me tog phul cig de nas ni// khru brgya'i phyi rol sa gzhi la// yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ru// a pA mArga'i yam shing gis// me ni rab tu sbar byas
272a7: nas/ / shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis// rtsa ba'i snying po sbrang rtsi zho// mar gyi bsregs blugs brgyad brgyar dbul// de nas sangs rgyas byang sems dang // lha rnams la'ang mchod yon dbul//
272a8: de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru// gso sbyong yongs su blangs pa yis// skyes bu srung ba'i phreng ba dang // dbang po tshang ba bzhag par bya// de la 'dir ni brjod bya ste// gang zhig rnam pa gzhan
272b1: bya ba/ / skyong ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste// dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad rnams ni// yang dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir cho ga byas pa yis// slob mas dam tshig shes par 'gyur// de nas
272b2: dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang / / rab gnas slob mas thabs cig tu// song nas ku sha bting ba las// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// tshogs kun rjes su dran pa yis// g.yas pa'i gzhogs
272b3: kyis nyal bar bya/ / de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis// gtsang ma shar du kha phyogs pas// rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya// de la 'di ni brjod bya ste// gang zhig tsan dan bil ba sogs// u dum war
272b4: sogs n+ya gro d+ha/ / rgyal mtshan phreng bas khyab pa dang // rmi lam rab tu dad pa'ang rung // kha cig me lce mdos pa dang // de ltar mthong ba de dngos grub// mchog gi bar du'o ngang pa dang // kA ran+ta bkrung /
272b5: krung dang // ma bya ro ha Na rnams ni// gang zhig de lta bu mthong 'gyur// mi lam bar ma'i dngos grub de// myur ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur// ma'am ra ta Na yang rung // de bzhin pi wang thogs
272b6: pa dang / / kuN+Da la sogs pa yang rung // de bzhin a srog d+hi mthong na// gang yang rmi lam mthong byed pa// mi rnams tha ma'i dngos grub de// sgrol ma'i rtog par nges par bstan//
272b7: gtum po khyi yi lag pa rnams// gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang // bong bu rnga mo shing rta sogs// mthong dang reg pa nyid sogs sam// rgya skyegs til mar gyis reg pa// gang gis rmi lam
272b8: du 'jug pa/ / de yi dngos grub nges par gnas// dam tshig tsam du 'byung bar 'gyur// de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan// rmi lam blo yis rnam dpyad nas// de ltar rab blo gang shes
273a1: nas/ / slob ma de la rmi lam gyi// lung du yang ni bstan par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// gal te khyim gnas gyur pa 'am// dge slong dge slong ma dang ni// dge
273a2: bsnyen dge bsnyen ma yang rung / / chen po de rnams gso sbyong ni// bzung ste phyin nas slob ma rnams// gso sbyong yang dag gus par bya// slob marmi lam mi dge ba// bstan bya sngon du sbyin sreg bya//
273a3: nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// snga mkho nangs dang mi/ ras ris mthar ni a lAs// zangs las 'byung ba rab zhugs te// yang dag 'jog par byed du gzhug/ de nas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la// tsan dan
273a4: chu yis legs par byug/ slob ma thams cad gnas cig tu// snying pos srung ba byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor phyi yi gnas cig tu// nyer 'dug dam tshig shes pa rnams// nang du rab tu
273a5: gzhug par bya/ / de nas nyim nub dus su// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu ni// tshen sna lnga pa rtsa ba yi// snying po lan bdun bsngags byas te// dbang ldan
273a6: phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ / phur bu de rnams srad bus bcings// de dag thams cad khru yi tshad// gsum byas srad bus yongs dkri bye// phyi nas kun tu dung dang ni// rnga bo che dang rnga rnga dang // mkhar rnga rnam
273a7: pa sna tshogs pa'i/ / mkhar ba dang ni pheg rdob rnams// kun nas 'khrol bar byed du gzhug/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs// phyi rol du ni dgram par bya// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/
273a8: tshon sna lnga pa'i thig skud kyis// khru brgyar byas nas thig gdab bya// de lam dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste// de nas kha dog thams cad pa// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad
273b1: brgyad bzlas/ / de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa yi// nyan thos dge 'dun rnams la ni// phyag byas dkyil 'khor
273b2: khor yug tu/ / rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas che// ral pa gcig pa'i snying po yis// gdug pa'i sems can thams cad kyi// sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o// dkyil 'khor yang ni thams cad kyi//
273b3: slob dpon gyi ni yo byad rnams// ral cig snying po nyid kyis ni// thog mar bsrung ba byas nas ni// byang shar phyogs nas brtsams byas te// tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya// rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid
273b4: dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris/ / yongasu bcad cing lus dkar ba'i// slob de de bzhin gshegs rnams la// phyag bya rin chen phye mas so// pad+ma'i rigs la phyag byas te// bye ma
273b5: ser pos bcom ldan ma/ / 'phags ma sgrol ma phyag byas nas// ljang gu rnam kyis nyan thos kun// rang sangs rgyas kun phyag byas nas// nag pos rdo rje'i rigs la'o// de ltar dang pos dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo
273b6: bzhi pa'i snying por ro/ / phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyi tshad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o// gsum pa mtho gang pa de'i nyis 'gyur ro// de ltar thams cad du rim gyis bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri bar 'dod
273b7: pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad der rang byon par mdzad du gsol/ 'bru thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang /
273b8: dri dang me tog thams cad dang / tsan dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba/ mA ShA'i yal mdab kyis kha bkab pa/ du ku la'i ras dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa/ gser dang dngul las byung ba/ dkyil 'khor
274a1: d e'i yo byad thams cad ras ris gnyis pa'i mthar me tog gi phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
274a2: su bzhag par bya'o/ / de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig don dang bsod nams don// 'dod don so sor dmigs byed du// sdom pa gzung bar byas gyur nas// gang du gnas pa thams cad nas// dkyil
274a3: 'khor mchog 'di bri bar bya/ / gzhan gyis mi thub thugs rje che// sangs rgyas byams pa sman mar bcas// 'di rnams ming ni kun drang nas// de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya// 'jig rten
274a4: gsum rgyal dkar mor grags/ / de bzhin du ni khro gnyer can// khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste// 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas// spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya// reg pa mchog
274a5: las slar 'jigs byed/ / rdo rje ser skya rdo rje ni// drag por bzhed dang seng ge dang // de bzhin do 'u chur nyid// 'di rnams ming ni kun nas ni// phyag na rdo rje kunatabri// de nas dkyil
274a6: 'khor slob dpon gyis/ / snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bye ma dkar po dang / yungs kar dkar po bsres pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa
274a7: ba spyod par mdang bzhid pa/ / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'o klun d+hA 'gro ba/ gtsug tor nas 'ong bar 'byung bzhin pa'i bco ma ldan 'das rnam pa mchag thams cad dang ldan pa skyes bu rten por
274a8: mtshan gyib btsun pa dang bar bras shi/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhogs gnyis su phye ma seng po dang pad+ma gi sar pan rkun bsres pas gtsu kor gyi rgyal po rnams kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas/
274b1: 'khrugs pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs kyi rnam pa can rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa// sa bon gyis gang ba dang //
274b2: 'brus phyag na bsnams pa la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba dang / kun nas 'bar ba'i gtsug tor dang / gdugs dkar po dang / gzi brjid bu da/
274b3: nor bu'i phung po dang / gser gyi phung po dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid
274b4: kyi phung po dang / rtag pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phung po dang / thams cad phung po dang / sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i phung po dang / 'jig rten gsum pa'i phung po dang / mthar
274b5: yas phung po dang / bsod nams phung po dang / lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhogs su nye bar bzhugs pa'o// g.yon du 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'il gtsug tor dang / mngon
274b6: par 'phags pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par mtho ba dang / sa'i 'dab ma dang / 'deb ma brgya pa dang / 'dab ma stong pa dang / 'od gzer dang / 'od gzer chen
274b7: po dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od gzer dang / bkod pa'i 'od gzer dang / dkar po'i 'od gzer dang / pad+ma'i 'od gzer dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang / bdud bzhi'i rnam par 'dul ba'i gtsug
274b8: tor dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa dang / lung bstan pa zhes gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'di rnams
275a1: g.yon gyi steng du bri bar bya'o/ / gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba'i nye logs su 'phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal ma chen mo brgyad bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma spyan ma
275a2: dang / mdzod spu dang / zla ba dang / snying rje ma dang / byams pa ma dang / mo 'jigs ma dang / lung bstan ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa zhes bya 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/
275a3: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'khrugs pa rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
275a4: pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying po zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par
275a5: rtog bzhin pa/ rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku bri'o// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po khro bo'i gzugs can pad+ma'i gdan
275a6: la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ rtse gsum dang zhags pas phyag brel cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la blta'o// gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi
275a7: nye logs su phreng gcig la rten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / phyi nas dge sbyong ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzes ma dang //
275a8: sangs rgyas dkar mo dang / de bzhin gshegs ma sems ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku'o// de bzhin
275b1: gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ / 'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu
275b2: snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs
275b3: pa'i sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs
275b4: pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/ / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po kun nas 'od pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ phyag
275b5: na pad+ma ste/ de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs g.yas pas sa bon gyi gang pa dang / phyag g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa/ rang gi cha byad kyis kun tu gnas par yang ngo // gtsug ter gyi rgyal po'i
275b6: steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad ji ltar rig par bri bar bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / steng gi drang srong dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha'i drang srong
275b7: dang / mA dar dang / bcas pa dang / legs par bces pa dang / brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang sangs rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
275b8: zhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bla gos ser po can no// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon du snam sbyar ro// mdun gyi 'og tu
276a1: chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa la gnas pa'o// de'i yang nye logs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol
276a2: mas non pa zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags me sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'i 'og tu pad+ma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig
276a3: pa'i rgyal mo bri bar bya'o/ / pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ dal dang / ras kyi smad g.yogs dang stod g.yogs can/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs la lta bar
276a4: gyur pa/ bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o// de'i gong du pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i khro ba'i mdog dmar po kun nas brar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags
276a5: ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ dang dang ras kyi smad g.yogs
276a6: can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus su bya'o// sgrol ma'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam
276a7: par brgyan pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ dar la dang ras kyi smad g.yogs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o// sman ras gzigs
276a8: dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa 'gro ba zhes bya ba pr-i yang ku ltar sngo bsangs cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang / pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ ral pa'i cod pan
276b1: 'chang ba/ g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i smad g.yogs dang / dar la'i stod g.yogs 'chang ba/ shin tu dang pa'i sku/ 'od gzer 'bar ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o//
276b2: dri ma med pa 'gro ba'i steng gi g.yon du bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi thugs dang bgrang phreng dang / g.yeng gzhi nag po can dang / rab tu dang ba'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng
276b3: bas 'khrugs pa bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs byed pa pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa skra dkar po pad+ma'i sdong bus dkris pa'i lus can phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dang / g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu
276b4: phyag tu bkod pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can/ phyag na rdo rje'i g.yas kyi snam bu cig la rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das rig pa
276b5: mchog dang nyal ba dang / legs par grub par byed pa dang / rdo rje sde dang / dpung bzang dang / ral pa gyen pa rjes dang / rig pa bzang po dang / legs 'gru ba dang / sde bzang dang / stobs po che dang rnam par
276b6: 'joms pa dang / ki lI ki la dang / mchog dang / legs 'dul dang / 'gro lding ba dang / sngon rabs dang / rin chen ke lI dang / byis pa'i ke lI dang / legs par ke lI dang / legs par gang ba dang / gdab
276b7: chen po dang / lha mthar byed dang / rdo rje chen po dang / 'bar bzhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngags kyi rgyal po chen po ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ yut+pal
276b8: ltar sngo bsangs/ bzhon cung zad khro gnyer du byas pa phyag g.yon pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa'o// 'di dag gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bri bar bya ste/
277a1: bcom ldan 'das m+b+han+man+tha dang / rdodza lpags k+Sha ma dang / dang lhags / da na dod+harnas par rnam ma dang
277a2: dmar po ldan ma dang / grags ldan ma dang / be shin rdo rje sprin ma dang / rdo rje khri gnyer ma dang / de khu tshur ma dang / rdo rjem lajigs pa dang rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
277a3: sgra ldan ma dang / rdo rje dge legs ma dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rjem mo dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / rdo rje gnas lcags ma dang / dus kyi rdo rje ma dang / rdorje
277a4: gtsug pud ma dang / rdo rje bka' bsgo chen mo dang / rdo rje 'od dang rgyal ba ldan ma dang / rdo rje gzugs ldan ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams rdo rje rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal chen mo ste/
277a5: mthu la nye bar 'dug pa ut+pal ltar spro bsangs kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan par byas po dang / dar dang ras kyi sham bathang dar la'i spyod g.yogs bsgrubs pa
277a6: g.yon pa rdo rje dang / g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lhas bstod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o// de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brla lta bar gyur
277a7: pa/ rang gi gzugs dang / chu byad dang dbyibs bzhin du bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas kyi gzhog su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston khar sprin ltar dkar ba
277a8: ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ 'od dpag mang dbus su bzhugs pa/ darala'i snod gamigs can/ dal dang ras kyi shem thabs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa
277b1: phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byas pa'i lus can/ cung zad de
277b2: bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog can/ pad+ma'i gdan la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan
277b3: pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ dar dang ras kyi sham thab can/ stod g.yogs dmar po banabs pa phyag g.ya pra bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ phyag g.yon pas rnga yab kyis
277b4: brel ba/ 'bar ba'i 'khrugs pa'i phyag cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po pri
277b5: yad+ya ku ltar sngo bsangs ma kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ cung zad 'dzum bzhin pa/ dar dang ras kyi sham babs can/ stong
277b6: g.yogs dmar po banabs pa/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pal yongs su bzung nas g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lus cung bad 'dud pa/ lang tshe dang po can
277b7: ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi g.yas su phreng cig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bco brgyad la 'di lta
277b8: ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang / phyag stong pa dang / phyag brgya pa dang / phyag bcu gnyis pa dang / phyag drug pa dang / phyag bzhi pa dang / zhabs
278a1: stong pa dang / zhabs brgya pa dang / zhabs bcu gnyis pa dang / zhabs drug pa dang / zhabs bzhi pa dang / ta mgrin dang / don yod zhags pa dang /
278a2: 'od zer stong gis rnam par snang ba dang / mgrin pa dkar pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / mtha' yas rnam rgyal dang / rnam rgyal chen po dang / lha'i mtha' dang / mtha'
278a3: dpag tu med pa dang / yid kyis shing rta dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di rnams pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo srid par 'jug pa nye bar spyod par byed pa kun nas 'bar
278a4: ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa pad+ma'i lus kyis nye bar bskor ba'i lus phyog na pad+ma dang / g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ cung zad sgrol ma la lta bar gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nye logs
278a5: su gos dkar mo pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ phyag na pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa dang
278a6: g.yas pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa'o/ / de'i yang g.yas su phred cig la bsten pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi gtso mo bcu bzhi bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can
278a7: dang dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo dang / dpal bdun ma dang / pad+ma go bo rig dang / grags ldan ma dang / sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i zla ba ma dang / longs spyod ldan ma dang / bde ldan ma dang
278a8: grags pa ldan ma dang / shes rab gos can ma dang / stobs gcig ma dang / stobs mang po dang / stobs bcu ma dang / sangs rgyas kyi yum dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi yum zhes pa
278b1: 'di rnams rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa lha'i bud med kyi cha byad 'chang ba/ rab tu dang
278b2: ba'i skra/ cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// pad+ma bsnams shing g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ rang gi gzugs su bri bar bya'o// sgrol ma'i 'og tu ci bgyi zhes bya ba bcom
278b3: ldan 'dis las 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ lus brtan pa nag po mthar byed pa'i gzugs can/ khro gnyer du byas pa/ mche ba gtsigs
278b4: pa/ zhal gcig gis drag tu bzhad pas gdangs bzhin pa/ gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bzhin pa/ dang pos sgrol ma lta ba'o// phyag dang pos rin po che mthong ba 'byin par byed bzhin
278b5: pa/ g.yon dang pos zhags pa bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su khro bo chen po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba lha chen po la nye bar
278b6: 'dug pa/ pad+ma'i chu bas dkris pa'i lus can ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug pa dang dbang bskur
278b7: ba'i cho ga thams cad sngar brjod pa kho na'o/ / ral ba gyin brjes kyi rgyud phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzi gas
278b8: dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ral pa gyen brjes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rang gi snying po sbyin par bgyi'o//
279a1: gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / nye bar 'tsho ba dang / nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// de nas
279a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan dus gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so/ / khyod kyis smros shig
279a3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rang gi skyong po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas 'di las dkyil 'khor che// dam pa yang dag rab chang byed/
279a4: dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam pa ru/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor kun tu bre// de yi dbus su srad bu mnyam// gru bzhi yongs su bskor ba'i bya// gnyis par 'doms pa po song ste// dkyil
279a5: 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ / dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul gyi ni// ri mo bzhi po rnams kyang ngo // pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ pad+ma yi ge ze 'bru la/ 'jig rten mgon po
279a6: bgod par bya/ / pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba rnams// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan kun tu bri// de ru slob dpon rab bzhugs nas// pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya mchog/ dkyil 'khor gnas la nyer
279a7: 'dug pas/ / mnyam par gzhag pas mnyam par dgod// ji ltar chu la pad+ma gang // gnas kyi nyes pa mang pos kyang // gos par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro la
279a8: chags pas yang dag byed/ / lan cig 'di gsungs dper brjod nas// de nas lcags kyu mchog dag gis// yang dag bkug nas pad+ma che// spyan ras gzigs dbang grol bar 'gyur// de la 'di ni
279b1: pad+ma'i lcags kyu chen chen po'o/ / oM mahA pad+mo d+hu dza hI// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs nas slob dpon la mthong ba sbyin par byed do// yang na 'od gzer stong par byed
279b2: ro/ / de nas 'di nyid kyis phyag rgyas slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste/ dar dkar pos gos dkar po dang / gtsug tor dkar phra mgo bo dkri bar bya'o// 'di nyid 'jig rten du rab tu brjod nas de nas smros shig/
279b3: zhes so// de nas pad+ma lag pa g.yon du byin nas g.yas pas chu snod byin te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad pad+ma che// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// 'phags pa spyan ras
279b4: gzigs dbang phyug/ de nyid lhan cig brtag par bya/ zhes so// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang ting nge 'dzin yang bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas
279b5: pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste de bzhin du dkyi lto bris nas dbus kyi ze 'bru la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa de la kun tu gzigs
279b6: par byed pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid thob par byed do/ / zhes pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin kho nar dkyil 'khor ba rtag par byas nas
279b7: dbus su parda stong dgong du gzhug go/ / de nas pad+ma srong po bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya ste la na re lan re yongs su bzlas nas so// de nas slob ma rab tu bcug nas dam chog brjod par bya'o//
279b8: bu dang slob ma'i ched du yang // dam tshig nyams par mi bya ste/ dam tshig bdag la brjod par bya/ gang phyir pad+ma'i rnam pa las/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chag thams
280a1: cad dag/ dam tshig gi ni dkyil 'khor ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mchod// lus
280a2: kyis spyan ras gzigs mgon la/ / ngag gis phyag na rdo rje la// las las nam mkha'i snying por skyes// ji ltar sgrub thabs cho gar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri rab
280a3: lhun po'i ri'i rtse mor 'khod pa rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis kun tu gnas pa'i sku thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgyad do zhes so/ / de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyis tshes gcig nas brtsamra te/ rtag tu thams cad
280a4: dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun tu bzlas pas ji srid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'phros nas sgrub pa po'i pad+ma'i dbus su 'khor
280a5: de slar yang de nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzhan 'byung ste sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur ba gnas shing brtan par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bdag gis dngos po thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mtshungs pa skad cig de la bde ba
280a6: dang ldan dang ji srid du 'phur bar byed do/ / sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes so// de nas sgrub pa gzhan dang las chen po thams cad 'byung ste 'bum bzlas pas las kyi sgrib pa thams
280a7: cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad lhag ma med par zad par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas bsod nams thams cad
280a8: mngon du 'gyur ro/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa lngas bzlas pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang
280b1: mngon du 'gyur ro/ / de nas phyag rgya chen po ni mchod rten stong phrag brgya byas nas mthar tshogs mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas snying khar rab tu
280b2: 'jug par byed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' so sor rnyed do// de nas zhal du rab tu 'jug par byed do// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug so sor rnyed do// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad 'gyur ro//
280b3: thog mar brjod pas gzhan gyi grong dang grong khyer srung ba dang / mdzes par spyad pas thams cad bya'o// 'bebs po la tsan dan gyi bdug pas gdon 'bebs so// shi rI Sha'i me tog gis sems can dbang du byed do//
280b4: dri bzang po'i me tog gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do// sa dkar pos bud med do// dri zhim po'i me tog gis chom rkun rengs pa'o// yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gis ri dgas dang bya rengs so//
280b5: yungs kar dkar po gtor bas mig 'phrul ston par byed do// mabya'i nums mi lam ston par byed do// dus gsuM bzlas pas rmi lam ngan pa 'doms par byed do/ til kyi sbyin mo//
280b6: gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do// bya gag gi gshog pa'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed do// rgyal po khyil pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gi 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed do//
280b7: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas mtshan mo brgyad spyad par gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o// de nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//
280b8: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la bud med kyi dbang po'i sprul sbyin sreg gis so// bu mo dbang du byed pa la yang ngo // don gzhan la yang
281a1: sbyin sreg dang bcas pas spyan ras gzigs dbang gi mdun du sti ma re rer dus gsum du bzlas pa bya/ ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgung phye mar las chen po thams
281a2: cad kyi rdzu 'phrul lo/ / de nas sems dpa' chen po de ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i mnyam par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so//
281a3: khru lnga pa dang sgo bzhi dang // sgo khyud rta babs nges gnas pa// phyi rol pad+ma'i rnam par bya// de nas kun nas gre rnams su'ang // de ni legs par bsams byas nas/ nang gi dkyil 'khor du
281a4: bar bya/ / sngar brjod snying po 'di yis ni// zlos bzhin 'di ni srung ba dang // dkar po dmar po ser po dang // nag po ljang gu tshon sna lnga'i// bye ma 'jam po rnams kyis ni// sgrob
281a5: ma'i rig pas mngon bsngags pas/ / bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das ni bya// / khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du ste// g.yon du ral pa gcig ma bya// g.yas su 'dab skyes phyi rol gyi// sgo khrud
281a6: snying por ji rigs grub/ / yongs su 'dod pas rdo rigs bya// dri yi phye mas yongs su byang // rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// gang du 'jig rten gsum tshig/ rdo rje 'chang chen 'dod
281a7: pa yis/ / 'das pas rnam par thim par 'gyur// khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur bcas// de ni g.yas kyi sgo khang du// stobs po che ni rab bzhag nas// nya yis mgrin par stobs po che// nub
281a8: phyogs su ni bya ba'o/ / g.yas kyi phyi yi sgo khang du// de bzhin dbang phyug chen po bya// de la mdung gi phyag rgya dgod// ji 'dra'i u ma bri bar bya// lho yi grwa gnyis su bya ba// phyag rgya
281b1: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ / nub dang byang gi grwa rnamasu// log 'dren phyag rgya rdo rje'o// byang gi grwa gnyis rnams su ni// mkhas pas rig gis spyan pa bya// shar gyi grwa cig rnams su ni/
281b2: ma mo tshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod// b+h+r-i gi ri Ta log 'dren bcas// de nas ji ltar 'byor pa yis// cho gas ji bzhin lha rnams mchod// khro bo stobs chen sgrol mas non// bzlas pas bdag nyid
281b3: bsrung bar bya/ / ka ra bI ra ta la ni// blangs nas rang gnas spung gnas pas// mkhas pas byang gi sgo khang du// gtsang ma gang du rab 'jug bya// blo dang ldan pas spyan drang bya// khro bo'i rgyal
281b4: pos thams cad nas/ / ji ltar rig pa'i cho ga yis// tshar bcod rjes su 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gdon dang lus kyi las rnams ni// de nyid du ni nges par bya// tshar bcad dam tshig bde ba 'dri//
281b5: gdon 'pho byed dang za byed dang // gang zhig la la gsod pa dang // de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang // sems can rnams ni thams cad nyid// sgrub thabs bya dang 'khrul 'khor ni// ji 'dra 'khor
281b6: ba yis bya ba dang / / mkhas pas las ni stong dag dang // gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang // rang gi rigapa dang gzhan rigs kyi// phyag rgya nye bar mtshon par bya// 'di yi dkyil 'khor
281b7: thams cad nas/ / 'byung po'i tshogs la sogs pa kun// de nas gtor ma bdug pa sogs// rgyas pas mngon par mchod byar gyis// de yis gdon mthong de mchod bya//
281b8: byis kyi dbang las dul ba thob// ske bos btung ba sprin sreg la// sogs pa rnam par gzhom par bya// shi Sha lAn tsan blangs nas// gdon thob pa ni 'pho bar bya// srin po rnams kyis byin pa'i
282a1: mang sa nan pa nga/ / la sa// u saka/ na / /
282a2: ma gas sbyinas byu // rgyus dang nga pa ban pa / das pa rnams rna gams dang/ lha pa gas
282a3: gnas/ / ril pa thugs ma thub nyid// phyag tu tham pa can gas pad/ cigasam kun dang thad da// dam mnas pags pa/ ma ga pa dang rjen dang
282a4: na rnams te mdun du d+h+r-igs/ / gem+b+ha ga ngas ka bdan dang / rdzam bya bzhin bya mad+mo// drug tu gnan nam can bsha/ gabang lo dang brtson nyid// ral zla zab cad nas
282a5: 9/ mig cad byas rgyal ba bshad// mche bstan nas chen thog// bum pa gtan shing de bzhin du/ dad pa'ang g.yan gzhogs phyag bya// phyag rgyal ba dkar bku/
282a6: nam thu rnams dang gtor pan dang // rgyan po gtum pa mthong ba na// nam gru dkar po rnams kyin+ta/ rang gi/ gzugs nyid mthang ban// mdangs 'phrogs rnams kyi lhung bzed dum// gdags
282a7: par byed pa grol ba'o/ / de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byed pa thams cad dge ba la/ shing cig gam ni dur khrod dam/ khang stong gtsang mtsha sgo med pa'i sa gan
282a8: mthong nas sgrub pa po khros pas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor nye bar blugs te re khA gsum dar bya'o/ / kun nas khru bzhi pa la dang por thal ba'i re khA'o// gnyis pa ri'i
282b1: btsag gi'o/ / gsum pa sol ba'i phye mas rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya'o// byang ngam nub tu yang sgo cig byed du gzhug go// sgo'i dbus su yang lha chen po lag na mdung thogs pa bya'o// sna du
282b2: nang du sangs rgyas bden par zad du byung ba'i bdag nyid can bya'o/ / sangs rgyas g.yas kyi gzhogs su sgrol mas non pa rnam par dgod par bya'o// g.yon du dpa' mo chen mo stobs mo che ma ral pa cag
282b3: ma bzhag nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rgyab tu dgod par bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po ma tha' yas dang / / de bzhin du 'jog po dang / dpa' bo chen po stobs kyi rgyu yang dgod par bya'o// de bzhin du pad+ma dang / pa
282b4: chen po dang / dung skyong dang rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du mngon par brjod pa'o// lha de rnams ni 'khor dang bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o// 'di thams cad nas ma mo'i tshogs rnam par med par
282b5: bya ste/ dang ldan ma ni rnam bu'o// sgo ru ske'u dang / rA dang / bum rnam yang sgo'i spyan par ba yi yang ngo // nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams lto 'phye chen po las ma 'das pa yang dag par mchod de/ stong
282b6: drag bzlas par bya'o/ / shes rab can sngags kyi rgyal po grub par 'gyur ro// rims dang gdon thams cad las 'byin pa dang / rtsod pa yang rnam par 'joms par byed do// rang gnas su 'jug
282b7: de nas gsang sngags 'di yang rtag tu bzlas pa'i gu gul gyi chu 'am ku shas gzhan gyis me thub pa dang / zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon par mdzes pa can nyid spyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu
282b8: thab par thab ste/ pa me cad 'joms pa snol mas non pa gang yon pa de ni gsang ba'i sgrubababs kyi dkyil 'khar/ de nas yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa can pa byims pas bcom ldan 'das dpa'
283a1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par dgas pa sang+yas r+b+bas Sh+TaH thub la phyag lan pa 'din sa smras pa/ / na sa mdun par shes pa da/
283a2: kasheg+sa pa rin chen tog la mngon sum du zas pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman ras gzigs dang blug zhes/ la ha la rnas pa stong pa ram pa khyen brjes kyi na bye mar sems can gyi don gyi bya
283a3: dang sgrol ma'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir dang / babs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gi bkad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral bya/ byams pa smos shig na ma sar+b+ba tAr+dz+dza ka tiD+D+h+ya/ man+ta
283a4: bA ru Sha ri Sha b+he g+han ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ma hA s+thA ma bAp+ta me tra ya me n+tu shrI badz+ra pA Ni pra b+h+r-i ti d+h+ye ma hA satwe b+h+ya/ de rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'bigs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod/
283a5: kyi snying po 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa sams can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa srid pa'i lam rnam par 'joms par byed pa brjod par bgyi'o// sat+ya thing ge bo d+ha satwa/
283a6: satwa/ he ha le/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta bahi ta tsit+ta kA ru Ni kA mA/ ga ma bi ya tau/ ma hA bi ya ti/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru tsa len+ta/
283a7: ba li na mas+thA sAs r+b+bas// yaH/ no/ ma/ rmAH/ b+hash+leH/ sarba.Arba/ su~M praSh+Tas/ bla ma la
283a8: Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ kr-iSh+Ta dzi na/ dza nA mu ku TA ba la mu tA la mA la ba la ma la ma la/ ka la ka la/ na la ha la ha la/ hu lu hu
283b1: lu/ he bo d+hi satwA/ pri ya bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ na ma te ru/ ku ru ku ru/ hr-i da ya/ ma nu sma ra/ i daM tsa me/ kAr+ya ku ru swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
283b2: gzigs dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ste/ nyi ma se ser tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor byas te dri dang me tog la sogs pa mngon
283b3: bar bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o/ / de nas nad thams cad nye bar ni bar byed do// zla ba drug kho nar byas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
283b4: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' smra ngas gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ gal te mtshams med pa byas pas kyang ma grub pa na de'i tsheng mtshams med pa byas pa dang / bdag nyi
283b5: ba'in gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyur cig zhes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsal te/
283b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyud phyi mar 'jig pa thams cad kyi rig po sring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
283b7: kyi rnam par gzigs par gyur po/ rtog pa bzhir skyes pa/ thung ngu'i gzugs can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ sa reg dang mi snang ba dang / re langs dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rkang pas rab tu
283b8: bkred pa dang / rnas pa can dang / mngon spyod can dang / dbang du byed pa dang / bskal pa bzang po nyid rab tu sbyin pa pa tshangs pa dang / khrab 'dug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsus pa la

284b8: n a
285a1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i spyan rnams so/ / de nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs
285a2: dbang phyug la yang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu'i spyan lnga po rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal pa ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos
285a3: grub sbyin par byed pa sgrol ma'i rtog par don chen po sbyin pa phyag na rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba pad+ma'i phyag la mnga' bdag tu gyur pa'o/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gsungs par gyur to// gcig
285a4: gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang ni/ / ji srid khru ni brgyad kyi bar// nor 'dod pa yis khru cig ste// bu 'dod pa yis khru gnyis so// dgra nyams byed pas khru gsum mo// bzlas pa nyid kyis khru
285a5: bzhi'o/ / lnga pa dngos grub thams cad la// brgyad pa mkha' la 'gro ba yis// sa 'og don dang 'bab chu dang // rgya mtsho dang ni dngos grub gnas// khyim du'ang rung ste gtsang ma yi// gzhan du g.yogs pa
285a6: byas pa dang / / las la shis pa gang rung gis// thig gis dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// gru bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa// sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis brgyan// dkyil 'khor cha gsum byas pa yis// steng gi cha ru
285a7: bcom ldan 'das/ / sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdan gnas pa// chos ston par ni mdzad bzhin pa// g.yas su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ tshangs pa'i dbyug pa spyi blugs phyag/ g.yon du 'phags pa phyag rdo rje// rdo rje
285a8: phyag gam de gzhogs su/ / khyab 'jug dud dang 'khor lo ste// be cen phyag na 'khor lo'o// dbus kyi cha ru gu la zhon// gru yi srog shing sgreng ba'o// dang por rdo rje rab 'joms dang // sgyu 'phrul dang ni
285b1: tum bu ru/ / gnyis par rdo rje khu tshur dang // rgyal mar bcas pa'o gsum pa ru// lus dmar dang ni rnam rgyal bcas// bzhi par rdo rje bsags mtha' dang // ba mi thub mar bcas lnga pa ru//
285b2: nig gzhan mi thub dang bcas// ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang // ser po nug po ga rims bzhin// lha rnams dgod par byas nas ni// dkar po'i gos dang dkar ba'i rgyan// be c+doMn rdo rje gtun shing dang //
285b3: gzhu dang ral gri mtshon cha'i phyag/ dbus su za nyid bad+mal// lha rnams mngon sum dgod par bya// glu yi 'og tu me dang ni// chu yi gter ni gnas par bya// dung dang nya dang chu sbyin gyis// rnam par
285b4: brtson pa'i shar dang lho/ / nub dang byang du dbang ba dang // gshin rje chu lha lus ngan rnams// bzhon pa bcas shing phyag rgyar bcas// legs par dkris pa'i bum pa ni// dri yi chu yis yongs su
285b5: bkang / / yul 'dab kyis ni nye bar mangs// garnams me dag par bya// 'dir ni bun pa la pa naM/ rin chen gyis brdzun 'dam pa y-i// gos rjes mgrin pa dkris pa dang // swA ha ka ra
285b6: yulu 'dub kyis/ / kha ni dgab par byas pa dang // gdugs steng me tog phreng bsnangs// shar gyi sgra ru dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor byi ru rgya mtsho bzhi// dung dang pad+mal sogs kyis/
285b7: ri yi rtse mi yos kyang bya// rgyal mtshon rnams 'khrugs bla re bres// in+d+ra nI la gau ser dang ni// dngul dang zangs dang lcags rnams kyi// bya mas dkyil 'khor bri bor bya// lha yi me tog bdug pas
285b8: bdug/ rnam pa sna tshogs gtor mas mchod// dus kyis non pa'i me tog 'bras// dbyig gser sna tshogs rin chen dang // bza' ba phyi rol gcal du dgram// ri bo'i steng du rab 'dug bya// snying
286a1: po phye mas spyan drang sogs/ / las rnams kun dang gshegs su gsol// de nas gang gis dkon mchog gsum// dad pas byang chub sems bskyed de// bud med skyes pa
286a2: gzhon du yi/ / bsnyen gnas byas pa gos kyis ni// gdong ni nye bar btsangs pa yis// dam tshig gis kyang mnyan par gyis// dbyig dang gsar gyi me tog gis// lag pa yis kyang dar bar bya// da ni gang
286a3: du lhung gyur pa/ / de yi rigs 'gyur de nas ni// gdong bye lha rnams bstan par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyang 'gyur// yang na nyin dang mtshan mo ru// dkyil 'khor de bri mnyes par 'gyur/
286a4: de ni sa gzugs brnyan 'byung ste/ a shwad+tha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / u dum wa ra zhi ba can dang / tsU ta dang / tsam pa ka dang / na ga ge sar gyis rgyas pa can dang / bil ba dang / a riSh+Ta dang
286a5: yis mngon spyod can no/ / dbang du byed pa dang skal ba ngan pa rnams la bad kan mthar byed dang / shasma li dang / dAr+b+ha bit+tA'o// skye bar byed pa la tsan dan dang / mya ngan med pa'i shing
286a6: dang / sbrang rtsadang / myos byed rnams so// zhal ba babang po nyid la a r+g+haM dat+ta las byung ba rnams so// las thams cad pa la gas las byung ba'o// rgyal srid 'dod pas na dngul las byung ba'o//
286a7: ngas na skal ba bzang ba'i tshad d+hag// lugs las byung ba ni mngan spyad can no// nyams par byed pa la tsam pa ka dang / nag gisar dang / bgul dang / a ti ma?/ ka2/ na 'dad pa las pa m+b+ha dang /
286a8: ka dang / mchi ka dang / myos byed dang / gosar shing dang / mA la~M ka rnams so// skal ba bzang po 'dod pas ni pad+ma dang / ku mu da'o// zhi ba can la ut+pa la dang / sarba ga n+ta ka'o//
286b1: rgyas pa can dang gzhan la yang dri bzang po can gyi me tog go// rgyas pa can gang la dris dman pa'i me tog go/ mngon spyod can dang nyams par byed pa la sogs pa la ni tsan dan la sogs pa'i dra
286b2: 'phrog pa'o/ / zhi ba can dang rgyas pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / bskal pa bzang po nyid la de lta bu'i bdug pa lag pa sbyar nas snying po'i sngags 'di rnams kyi las bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
286b3: na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa tur+N+Na b+ha gi nI rA/ na mo de ba tumU ru sAR+Ya k+Sha ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ni/ dzas+t+rai ka ro ta a mai traM/ staM b+ha ni/ sta b+hI ka rot+ya/ ma tra/ mo ha nAM/ ma hA
286b4: karo t+ya mai traM/ an+d+ha ni/ in+d+ri ka ro t+ya mai traM/ dza ye A gats+tsha bi dza ye A gats+tsha dzam+b+ha ni A gats+tsha stam+b+ha ni A gats+tsha/ ba li ba laM/ puSh+pa/ d+hA pa/ u pa hA ra/ pra ti grah+Na thA/ sa ma yA yu pA lA yA thA
286b5: su Tu Tu su sma badz+ra b+hany+dza nI ya swA hA/ / rig pa 'di ni stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / phug tu rab tu 'jug pa dang / gter 'pho bar byed pa dang /
286b6: rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang / mig sman ldong ros sgrub pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / nyams par byed pa dang / gzhan rab tu 'joms pa dang / rang gi yul so sor skyong ba dang / dug
286b7: dang / pho nya dang / nad 'gro ba dang / mche ba rab bsdams la yang dag par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / khros pas rgyal po'i khab rab tu sgrub pa ste de
286b8: bu la sogs pa'i las gzhan rnams kyang rang gi 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o/ / sring mo bzhi'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// / de nas slar yang dkyil 'khor gsungs pa
287a1: khwa bzhi bgru bzhi pa sgo bzhig/ kun nas rta babs kyis brgyan pa/ gshin rje dang chu lha dang / lus ngan rnams bzhon pa dang bcas mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i sgo skyong dang gsum
287a2: byed du gzhug go/ byang gi rab tu thob par bya ste cha gsum byas nas steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje yang phyag g.yon pas rdo rje dang g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/
287a3: kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g.yon du rdo rje lcags kyu lugra klul ga na thog pa/ gzhan du rdo rje lcags sgrog lcags sgrog lag na thogs pa/ thams cad kyang ri'i rtse mo la yang dag
287a4: bar gnas par bya'o/ / dbang ldan gyi phyogs la brten pa'i lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa/ khyu mchog dang bcas pa yang dag par bri'o// gzhan rnam pa gsum rim gyis mtshon cha dang /
287a5: gnas dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// b+haM gi ri ti dang / nag po chen po rnams so// nub tu mi sbyin dang / tum bu ru dang / 'od srung dang / sna tshogs bshes gnyen lag pa rnams ril pa sI
287a6: blugs dang chu snod phyag na bsnams pa'o/ / khron pa dang srog shing sgreng ba dang / ta ta spu bri'o// stod g.yogs ljang gu can lag na be con thogs pa cod pan gyis brgyan pa phyag na tog skyong pa bsnams pa
287a7: rna ba la rgya skyegs kyis brgyan pa'o/ / rgyal ba dkar po phyag na rdo rje thogs pa/ spyod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can no// rnam par rgyal ba lus dmar po phyag na gtun shing thogs pa/ gos
287a8: dmar po'i stod g.yogs can/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi gzhu phyag na bsnams pa'o// gzhan gyis mi thub pa nag mo gos khra bo'i stod g.yogs can/ gos nag po'i sham thabs can phyag na
287b1: la gri thogs pa gru la zhon pa'o/ / de nas zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / lha rnams dang / nang du pad+ma rab tu gtor ba bri bar ba'o// byang gi sgo ru log 'dren chen po g.yas kyi gzhogs su chu bor ba med khor
287b2: yug tu rdo rje dang / dung dang / la da dang / dpal be'u rnams kyang kun tu bri'o// de ltar thams cad yang dag par bris te de nas ji ltar 'byor bI gtor ma dang / thug pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang / bza'
287b3: ba rnam pa lnga dang / k+ShAny+tsa mang po dang / bza' dkris pa'i bag zan dang / dzam+bu li ka dang / zho dang / bu ram dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi ji ltar rig pa dbul bar bya'o//
287b4: chu'i bum pa bzhi ji ltar 'dod pa'i yal mdab kyis kha bkab pa dang / bum pa dri'i chu thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba sa bon thams cad dang sman thams cad dang yal mang ba dang / gos kyis
287b5: mgrin pa dkris pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang rin po che rnams dang / yal mdab kyis brgyan pa'i bum pa rnam pa lnga lnga rnams dang / phyi ru rin po che rnams kyis mngon par bkram pa'o// de
287b6: lta bu la sogs pa'i bkra shis pa rnams byas nas phyi nas bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas sngon du slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste/ 'di las gzhan pa'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na
287b7: nam sh+tsa N+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma shu tud+b+ha gi nI nAM ma ma dza yA ya/ mA he ti swA hA/ sngags 'di rnam par brgyad kyis sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// me tog dang
287b8: yungs kaur dang / lan tshwa dang / chu dang bal bas dri med nyid sun 'byin pa'i che byad kyis kyang ngo // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shuN+Da badra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha senA pa tA ye/ na mo bi dza
288a1: ya/ ha ha/ d+ha li/ ku mA ra ni biSh+Ta mu khe ra Te sha swA hA/ rig pa 'di 'bum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin gyi ga na ma lcags phob pa'i shing
288a2: blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du spung bar gnas par gyur par gang du mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa der song nas bum pa bzhi pa thams cad kyang me tog dang yal mdab kyis kha brgyan pa bzhag par bya'o/ /
288a3: de nas ku sha bting zhing bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor lugs gsum bcings pa'i pur bu 'am rkang pa g.yon pa lag pa g.yon pas mnan te ji srid du lag pa mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
288a4: lag pa btang bar yang mi bya'o// de nas phur bu de dgon par gdab par bya ste/ phur bu khyim du 'byung ngo // cho ga 'di nyid kyis btab nas pur bu rkang pa g.yon pas yang dag par mnan nas dbang du gyis
288a5: shig/ grong khyer 'jig pa'i lag pa btsir bas phyag rgya thams cad dang / dug byas pa rnams kyang 'joms par byed do// skye bo'i nang du yang gdab par bya ste thams cad du 'gyur ro// gzhan
288a6: la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las rnams byed do/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa ta sr-i NAM/ b+ha gi nI nAM/ na ma s+yAM bu ru/ sar+b+ba ba
288a7: has+ya/ ma hA kaR+Sha s+ya/ ba tsa pa tsi/ a mu kA ya/ b+haR+sha pra pa tAn+tu swA hA/ nag po'i brgyad pa'am nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum du spung bar gnas pas sngags 'di thod par
288a8: khrag gis bri bar bya'o/ / stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags par byas nas chu la dor bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA
288b1: yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma sh+tsa ta sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nAM/ na mo dzam+b+ha ni/ tsA Tuts+tsha Tu/ tsa Tu tsa Tu swA hA/ rig pa 'dis rgyal gyi zla ba la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu na le shaM gsum khar bcug ste/ stong phrag
288b2: brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas na le sha cig khar rab tu bcug ste gang mig mi 'dzum par lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shuN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se NA pa ta
288b3: ye/ na ma shA ti swe NAM b+hA gi nIn+taM/ na ma stu m+bu ru ma hA sAH/ bA d+hA ya/ na mo dza ye bi dza ye a dzi ti a pa ra dze te swA hA/ rig pa 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas nag po'i brgyad pa
